REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1229 reute r f BC-PARLEX-<PRLX>-APPOINT 03-19 0041

TEXT.TITLE: PARLEX <PRLX> APPOINTS CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER
TEXT.BODY: Parlex Corp said it named Robert Cyr to its newly-created post of chief operating officer. Cyr, 44, has been the company's senior vice president, the company said. Reuter
